FROM redis:2.8
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yy -q python && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY redis-master.conf /redis-master/redis.conf
COPY redis-slave.conf /redis-slave/redis.conf
COPY run.sh /run.sh

CMD [ "/run.sh" ]
ENTRYPOINT [ "sh", "-c" ]
